description:
Moved the bend sections up a string to make it easier to play and match what the bass player is seen doing in live concerts.  Also changed the bend on 3rd fret to bend on 4th cause I don't hear anything that would indicate he's on the 3rd fret.  Also replaced the 5-3-5 move with that 4th string bend for the same reason.  Fixed the slide to be on the correct string and go to the correct fret based on the sound that we hear.
(via editor)
title: Heart Shaped Box
